title: Person Of Interest.Season 1 Episode 1 First met John/Finch
author: Sabrina Estampe
comment: I've watched all 5 seasons over the last couple of months. I didnt actually realise how much they had changed and matured until I just watched this clip again. Finch looks so young lol. It's only been a couple of months!! So upset that this has ended :(
looking back after seeing the Season 5 finale. Finch looks so dang young here

I've watched all 5 seasons over the last couple of months. I didnt actually realise how much they had changed and matured until I just watched this clip again. Finch looks so young lol. It's only been a couple of months!! So upset that this has ended :(
From here to "When I hired you I suspected you'd be a great employee, what I couldn't have anticipated was that you'd become such a good friend."  😢
5x13 " when you came to me, You gave me a job, a purpose." Love Their relationship.
